headline: Assessing Kimberly-Clark (KMB) Valuation After A 20% One Year Total Return Loss
summary: Kimberly-Clark (KMB) has been drawing attention after a weak share performance over the past year, with the stock down about 20% on a total return basis, despite reporting US$19.7b in revenue. See our latest analysis for Kimberly-Clark. The recent weakness in Kimberly-Clark's share price, including an 18.38% 90 day share price decline and a 20.16% total shareholder return loss over the past year, points to fading momentum despite its US$19.7b in sales.
